titles.title: A bill to amend the CARES Act to establish a Community Capital Investment Program, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the CARES Act to establish a Community Capital Investment Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: This bill establishes the Community Capital Investment Program to provide capital investments and interest-free loans to community development financial institutions, minority depository institutions, and certain small credit unions and banks to support low-income borrowers.
